name: Atavism, Mass
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game: Ultimate Magic. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
target: one animal/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
text: This spell functions as atavism, except it affects multiple creatures.
target_zh: 每等级1只动物，任意两名之间的距离不得超过30尺
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同原始野性 (atavism) 一般，不过可以影响复数生物。
